name: Elicerent (Ghost Town)
description:
This game is about discerning the real from the decoys.

You walk  through different rooms to find Paradise but if you do not choose the right rooms to get to paradise, you will go down a bad route and eventually end up in the Dead Zone.

Walk into different object to discern whether they hare the decoys or not.

You will know whether you are on the right path by how the different rooms look.

Listen with headphones
